thread.title: Vijay Sales 2025-Apple iPhone 16 Price Cut To now available Rs 60,000 with amazing performance and camera
thread.title_full: Vijay Sales 2025-Apple iPhone 16 Price Cut To now available Rs 60,000 with amazing performance and camera

author: Vishal R
title: Vijay Sales 2025-Apple iPhone 16 Price Cut To now available Rs 60,000 with amazing performance and camera
text:
Vijay Sales 2025: This could be the ideal moment to get an iPhone 16. The Apple iPhone 16 is offered at an attractive price all over the Christmas and New Yearâ€™s holiday season, which is extremely uncommon. Once priced at Rs 79,900 when it first launched in India, you are able to buy this item for far less. This gadget offers a number of major upgrades over the iPhone 15 in terms of performance, design, camera, and other area. Vijay Sales is the one offering this deal on the Apple phone.
Apple iPhone 16 discount at Vijay Sales is as follows:
Currently priced at Rs 66,900 on Vijay Sales, the 128GB model of the Apple iPhone 16 is Rs 13,000 less than its original price. However, the price was lowered by Rs 10,000 to Rs 69,900 upon the release of the new iPhone 17. Customers are receiving a flat discount of Rs 3,000 as a result. The net effective price can be lowered to about Rs 62,900 by utilizing approved bank cards to further reduce the price by Rs 4,000. EMI options, which start at Rs 2,927 per month, are another option available to buyers. But be aware that you may be required to pay more for interest and processing.
Customers can also exchange their old gadgets for the best possible discount, based on the model, brand, and working condition of the device. Also, you can choose to use the device with Apple Care+.
Features of the Apple iPhone 16
A 6.1-inch Super Retina XDR OLED screen is a feature of the Apple iPhone 16. It has 8GB of RAM and the Apple A18 chipset. With a 3,561mAh battery, it has a longer battery life than the iPhone 15 and runs the most recent version of iOS 26. Additionally, 25W MagSafe wireless charging is supported.
The phone has a 12MP ultra-wide-angle camera and a 48MP primary shooter with sensor-shift optical image stabilization (OIS) for photography. The device features a 12MP selfie camera on the front.
